CHAT.comment: CRYSTAL M. FERGUSON, ET AL., Petitioners v. CITY OF CHARLESTON, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:03 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF PRISCILLA J. SMITH ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ROBERT H. HOOD ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF PRISCILLA J. SMITH ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:03 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
